summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of AI Product Creator 6-step wizard. All 12 backend API tests passed (100%). Full UI flow tested from Step 1 (Rasm) through Step 6 (Yaratish) for both Uzum and Yandex marketplaces. Integration between Scanner → Infographic → Marketplace endpoints working correctly.

minor.issue: AI competitor analysis occasionally returns JSON parse error (non-blocking)

critical_code_review_comments: 6-step wizard correctly implements: Rasm → Aniqlash → Tannarx → Infografika → Marketplace → Yaratish
Progress bar shows correct 6-step progression with checkmarks for completed steps
Back navigation (Orqaga) works correctly and preserves form data
Yandex Market shows 'To'liq API' badge (full automation)
Price analysis displays min/optimal/max prices correctly
Product card shows O'zbekcha/Ruscha tabs for Uzum, Russian only for Yandex
data-testid attributes present: camera-btn, upload-btn, product-name-input, cost-price-input, scan-btn
seed_data_creation: None - used test products: Samsung Galaxy A54 5G, iPhone 15 Pro Max
context_for_next_testing_agent: AI Product Creator 6-step wizard fully tested. Route: /create-product. Steps: 1)Rasm (Camera/Upload), 2)Aniqlash (Product Info), 3)Tannarx (Cost/Quantity), 4)Infografika (Nano Banana AI), 5)Marketplace (Uzum/Yandex selection), 6)Yaratish (Final result with price analysis, product card, upload instructions). Backend endpoints: POST /api/unified-scanner/full-process (Uzum), POST /api/yandex-market/full-process (Yandex), POST /api/infographic/generate. AI card generation takes 10-25 seconds.

step3_tannarx.weight_input: PASS - Weight in kg input works

step6_yaratish.product_card: PASS - Title and description with language tabs
step6_yaratish.marketplace_link: PASS - External link to seller portal

features_tested.progress_bar: PASS - Shows 6 steps with correct labels and checkmarks
features_tested.back_navigation: PASS - All back buttons work, form data preserved

api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/unified-scanner/uzum-rules: PASS - Returns rules, commissions, media requirements
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/yandex-market/rules: PASS - Returns rules, categories, media requirements
